channel.name: Cooking Channel US
channel.title: Burgers, Brew & 'Que
channel.desc: In Baton Rouge, La., pastry chef, Ron Ben-Israel, feasts on a mile-high key lime pie and a Caribbean-inspired brisket melt; in Louisville, Ky., a burger topped with chorizo and the bacon cinna-bomb; in Lexington, Ky., a spicy fried chicken sandwich.
